body: Jetpack jackets and rocket-powered heels – I think we’re getting closer to the future every day! Can’t wait to see what comes next!
I’d be scared of the jetpack jacket flying me into a tree or a lamp post! But hey, at least it would make for a great conversation starter, right?
The possibilities are endless, right? I’m just hoping that one day we’ll have jetpacks for everyone!
I agree! Imagine trying to navigate a crowded street with that thing! It could be a little more practical, but definitely fun to think about.
That would definitely be a challenge! But maybe they could come up with a way to make it more practical without losing the cool factor.
